title: Obese cat called Cinderblock really isn't taking her weight loss workout seriously in vet's workout
text:
A cute cat called Cinderblock appears to be taking things easy while completing her workout on a special treadmill.

The cat from Bellingham, Washington state who is morbidly obese, is now on a weight reduction program, which involves an underwater treadmill in order to shed the pounds.

But the clever kitty appears to have found a way to avoid getting on all-fours and in an adorable video shot by her vet, the cat simply taps away at a passing treadmill.

Cinderblock, an overweight cat from Bellingham, Washington, was recently caught slacking a bit on gym day

Her caretaker decided to switch things up and introduce an underwater workout

The short video sees the great cat sitting in about an inch of water while treadmill runs beneath her.

Clearly not used to having to do any kind of exercise, the cat decides to simply use one paw to complete her regime, all the while meowing away.

The video has already generated around 5,000 views online along with some sympathy as well.

'No No No No.........I hate workouts too.....' wrote one online poster.

But the cute kitty manages to get by using just one paw on the treadmill instead of all four
description: Cinder, an overweight cat from Washington state, was recently caught slacking a bit on gym day after her caretaker decided to switch things up and introduce an underwater workout.
